1: Shout to the Lord, all the earth.
2: Serve the Lord with joy. Come before him with singing.
3: Know that the Lord is God. He made us, and we belong to him. We are his people, the sheep he tends.
4: Come into his city with songs of thanksgiving. Come into his courtyards with songs of praise. Thank him, and praise his name.
5: The Lord is good. His love continues forever. His loyalty continues from now on.
